## Introduction

How are we already almost halfway through the year? The month of May flew by, and we’ve got a lot to share—Natalie MacLees just got back from AccessU, and the team is freshly done celebrating GAAD!

From accessibility events to product updates, let’s recap the month and what’s coming up next.

## AAArdvark Product Updates

Over the last few weeks, we’ve introduced a variety of fixes and improvements, including:

## What’s New and Noteworthy

## Quick Tip: Issue assignment in AAArdvark

Are you tired of chasing accessibility issue updates? Use issue assignment in AAArdvark to keep everyone on track.

Assign issues to specific teammates, and they can receive in-app notifications or emails (depending on their notification settings).

![](https://aaardvarkaccessibility.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/Assign-Issue-to-1024x557.png)Issue #25 marked as Critical and Active, assigned to Natalie, regarding missing alt text in `<area>` elements of image maps. Dropdown and buttons shown for assignment.
## Conclusion

Thanks for catching up with us! We’re glad to be on this journey with you as we work toward a more accessible web.

We’ve got more features, content, and events coming your way—so stay tuned as we roll into summer. Got questions or feedback? Our support team’s just a message away.
